items.title: The Home Depot unveils 2025 Halloween collection
items.description: The Home Depot reveals its 2025 Halloween collection, which promises to captivate decorators of all styles and budgets. Products will be available for purchase on HomeDepot.com and The Home Depot app starting August 4, and the collection can be previewed online now.Halloween products will hit Home Depot store shelves this fall.
